rukus.text: Takheun Tuhanku meunyo Neumeung bri Peue nyang Neujanji Neumeung peuleumah Neumeung peukalon atra nyan bak lon
Tuhanku bek lon roh lam beurakah Bek roh lon dalam kaom nyang lalem
Meunyo Kamoe tem ek Meupeuleumah Ek Meupeukalon dum nyan bak gata
Teuma digata beugot tapapah Tatulak ngon got buet nyang brok jih nyan Kamoe teupeue nyan peue nyang jipeugah
Takheun Tuhanku Neupeulindong lon Nibak s‘ah chetan jiyue buet salah
Neupeulindong lon wahe Tuhanku Bek jipeukaru bak lon jilangkah
Teuma awak nyan ‘oh teuka mawot Han ek le meumot jikheun treuk bagah Tuhanku Neubri lon woe u donya

Lon peubuet teuma amai jroh leupah Amai nyang shaleh nyang tinggai dilee Jinoe meuteuntee han le lon keubah Tapi atra nyan narit jih mantong Di likot jih dong padang that luah Sampoe geubangket jih han troh teuka
‘Oh Sangkai kala pih geuyup sudah Uroe nyan han le geutanyong bangsa Han le chedara nyang meugah-meugah Han jeuet teumanyong le bak uroe nyan
Nyang brat timbangan nyan nyang meutuah Nyankeuh ureueng nyan nyang meubahgia
Nyang phui ceulaka rugoe sileupah Jipeurugoe droe roh lam nuraka Keukai jeuep masa lam apui mirah
Jisama muža jitot le apui Meugasui-gasui hanco ngon patah b i
Kon ka geubaca dilee ayat Lon Keu gata bandum sulet tapeugah
Kheun treuk awak nyan hai Tuhan kamoe Jigiduek kamoe le buet nyang salah £ Kakeuh meunang jih u ateueh kamoe Jeuet treuk dum kamoe sisat sileupah
Neubri meuteubiet nibak teumpat nyoe Hai Tuhan kamoe saket that leupah Meunyo kamoe woe buet lagee dilee H Nyan ka meuteuntee kamoe nyang salah Kamoe nyang lalem droe meuelanya
Neukheun bah hinakeuh sinan dikah Beujrakeuh sinan mangat karasa Bek le meuhaba ngon Lon nyoe dikah
Saboh jamaʻah nibak hamba Lon Ureueng nyan geukheun wahe ya Allah Wahe Po kamoe kamoe meuiman Neuampon teuma kamoe ka salah Droe-Neuh sineujroh ureueng geumaseh Kamoe Neugaseh wahe ya Allah
Kaulok-ulok ureueng nyan bandum Hingga jeuet keu Lon tuwokeuh dikah f Bandumkeuh tuwo kaingat keu Lon Dawok kapeukhem ureueng nyan dikah
Uroe nyoe gopnyan nyang meubahgia k Sabab geusaba jinoe Lon balah
Neukheun padum thon keuh dalam bumoe
Sang-sang siuroe jiseuot bagah Meukon siuroe sang sikhan uroe Tatanyong keudroe bak ureueng ceudah Keudeh bak ureueng nyang jeuet meubileueng
Sideh kah geukheun rijang sileupah Meunyo kateupeue sideh kah tinggai Cit siat sagai leupah that bagah
Peue bak tasangka Meupeujeuet gata Cit sia-sia hana phaedah p Hana geupeuwoe gata le bak Lon
Maha Suci Lon Raja nyang meugah Raja nyang beuna nyang mat keurajeuen Kon laen tuhan meulengkan Allah Allahkeuh nyang Po ‘arasy mulia

Soe nyang tapuja meunyo kon Allah Beurangsoe puja tuhan nyang laen Jikheun na laen sajan ngon Allah Hana meudali nyang jipeugah nyan Neukira dum nyan teuma le Allah Tuhan nyang Po jih peugot keunira Hana bahgia si kaphe jadah

Takheun Tuhanku beu-Neupeuampon Neugaseh keu lon ureueng nyang salah Droe-Neuh sineujroh ureueng geumaseh Bandum Neugaseh wahe ya Allah AN-NUR (CAHAYA) s Ngon nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku Sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
